title: [River's Rest Hall, Courtyard]
description: A magnificent stone fountain dominates this small courtyard.  Marble planters display brilliantly colored flowering plants, and a few fruit trees provide cover.  Wooden benches carved to resemble whimsical crabs, fish, sharks and other marine animals surround the fountain.

A magnificent stone fountain dominates this small courtyard.  Marble planters display brilliantly colored flowering plants, and a few fruit trees provide shade.  Wooden benches carved to resemble whimsical crabs, fish, sharks and other marine animals surround the fountain.
